org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

类 QuotaObserverChore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScheduledChore
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.QuotaObserverChore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class QuotaObserverChore
extends ScheduledChore
    Reads the currently received Region filesystem-space use reports and acts on those which violate a defined quota.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  QuotaObserverChore.TablesWithQuotas
      A container which encapsulates the tables that have either a table quota or are contained in a namespace which have a namespace quota.

      • chore

      • _chore

        void _chore()
     throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • initializeSnapshotStores

        void initializeSnapshotStores(Map<RegionInfo,Long> regionSizes)

      • processTablesWithQuotas

        void processTablesWithQuotas(Set<TableName> tablesWithTableQuotas)
                      throws IOException
        Processes each TableName which has a quota defined and moves it in or out of violation based on the space use.
        参数:
        tablesWithTableQuotas - The HBase tables which have quotas defined
        抛出:
        IOException

      • processNamespacesWithQuotas

        void processNamespacesWithQuotas(Set<String> namespacesWithQuotas,
                                 org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.common.collect.Multimap<String,TableName> tablesByNamespace)
                          throws IOException
        Processes each namespace which has a quota defined and moves all of the tables contained in that namespace into or out of violation of the quota. Tables which are already in violation of a quota at the table level which also have a reside in a namespace with a violated quota will not have the namespace quota enacted. The table quota takes priority over the namespace quota.
        参数:
        namespacesWithQuotas - The set of namespaces that have quotas defined
        tablesByNamespace - A mapping of namespaces and the tables contained in those namespaces
        抛出:
        IOException

      • updateTableQuota

        void updateTableQuota(TableName table,
                      SpaceQuotaSnapshot currentSnapshot,
                      SpaceQuotaSnapshot targetSnapshot)
               throws IOException
        Updates the hbase:quota table with the new quota policy for this table if necessary.
        参数:
        table - The table being checked
        currentSnapshot - The state of the quota on this table from the previous invocation.
        targetSnapshot - The state the quota should be in for this table.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • updateNamespaceQuota

        void updateNamespaceQuota(String namespace,
                          SpaceQuotaSnapshot currentSnapshot,
                          SpaceQuotaSnapshot targetSnapshot,
                          org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.common.collect.Multimap<String,TableName> tablesByNamespace)
                   throws IOException
        Updates the hbase:quota table with the target quota policy for this namespace if necessary.
        参数:
        namespace - The namespace being checked
        currentSnapshot - The state of the quota on this namespace from the previous invocation
        targetSnapshot - The state the quota should be in for this namespace
        tablesByNamespace - A mapping of tables in namespaces.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • pruneOldRegionReports

        void pruneOldRegionReports()
        Removes region reports over a certain age.

      • fetchAllTablesWithQuotasDefined

        QuotaObserverChore.TablesWithQuotas fetchAllTablesWithQuotasDefined()
                                                             throws IOException
        Computes the set of all tables that have quotas defined. This includes tables with quotas explicitly set on them, in addition to tables that exist namespaces which have a quota defined.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getTableSnapshotStore

        QuotaSnapshotStore<TableName> getTableSnapshotStore()

      • getNamespaceSnapshotStore

        QuotaSnapshotStore<String> getNamespaceSnapshotStore()

        public Map<TableName,SpaceQuotaSnapshot> getTableQuotaSnapshots()
        Returns an unmodifiable view over the current SpaceQuotaSnapshot objects for each HBase table with a quota defined.

      • getNamespaceQuotaSnapshots

        public Map<String,SpaceQuotaSnapshot> getNamespaceQuotaSnapshots()
        Returns an unmodifiable view over the current SpaceQuotaSnapshot objects for each HBase namespace with a quota defined.

      • getPeriod

        static int getPeriod(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Extracts the period for the chore from the configuration.
        参数:
        conf - The configuration object.
        返回:
        The configured chore period or the default value in the given timeunit.
        另请参阅:
        getTimeUnit(Configuration)

      • getInitialDelay

        static long getInitialDelay(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Extracts the initial delay for the chore from the configuration.
        参数:
        conf - The configuration object.
        返回:
        The configured chore initial delay or the default value in the given timeunit.
        另请参阅:
        getTimeUnit(Configuration)

      • getTimeUnit

        static TimeUnit getTimeUnit(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Extracts the time unit for the chore period and initial delay from the configuration. The configuration value for QUOTA_OBSERVER_CHORE_TIMEUNIT_KEY must correspond to a TimeUnit value.
        参数:
        conf - The configuration object.
        返回:
        The configured time unit for the chore period and initial delay or the default value.

      • getRegionReportPercent

        static Double getRegionReportPercent(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Extracts the percent of Regions for a table to have been reported to enable quota violation state change.
        参数:
        conf - The configuration object.
        返回:
        The percent of regions reported to use.
